title: Performance Analysis Report
executive_summary: Comparison of GPU performance metrics between baseline and Test implementations across 8 ranks.
html_header:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en"><head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>Performance Analysis Report</title>
<style>
    body {
        font-family: sans-serif;
        line-height: 1.6;
        margin: 0 auto;
        padding: 20px;
        max-width: 800px;
    }
    h1, h2, h3 {
        border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;
        padding-bottom: 10px;
    }
    img {
        max-width: 100%;
        height: auto;
    }
</style>
</head>

charts.name: Percentage Change Overview
charts.description: Overall performance change across key GPU metrics. Positive values indicate improvement (Test is faster/better).

charts.name: Absolute Time Comparison
charts.description: Side-by-side comparison of absolute execution times for all GPU metrics.

charts.name: Performance Heatmap by Rank
charts.alt: GPU Metric Percentage Change by Rank (HeatMap)
charts.description: Comprehensive heatmap showing percent change for all metrics across all ranks. Green indicates better performance (positive % change).

charts.name: Total Time
charts.description: Total execution time comparison across all ranks, showing end-to-end performance characteristics.

charts.name: Computation Time
charts.description: Pure computation time excluding communication overhead, analyzed per rank.

charts.name: Communication Time
charts.description: Total time spent in collective communication operations across ranks.

charts.name: Idle Time
charts.description: GPU idle time comparison showing resource utilization efficiency per rank.

charts.name: Detailed Percentage Change by Metric
charts.description: Detailed breakdown of percent change for each metric type across all ranks.

charts.name: NCCL Communication Latency
charts.description: Mean communication latency for NCCL allreduce operations across different message sizes

charts.name: NCCL Algorithm Bandwidth
charts.description: Algorithm bandwidth achieved for different message sizes in NCCL collective operations.

charts.name: NCCL Bus Bandwidth
charts.description: Bus bandwidth utilization across NCCL operations and message sizes.

charts.name: NCCL Performance Percentage Change
charts.description: Percent change in communication latency and bandwidth metrics for each message size configuration

charts.name: NCCL Total Communication Latency
charts.description: Aggregate communication latency summed across all operations for each message size.
